text: In algebra, Binomials are polynomials that contains two terms that are monomials being either added or subtracted together. == Notable binomials == * The difference of two squares is a binomial that contains a squared variable that is being subtracted by another squared variableː x^2-y^2. This binomial is also the product of two linear binomials a+b and a-b. Category:Mathematics Category:Algebra
title: Binomial
